keyMoments.title: Blueno Demonstrates Air Doors
keyMoments.description: Blueno demonstrates his ability to create doors in the air, showing his mastery of the Doa Doa no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Reminds viewers of the versatile and dangerous powers Luffy must overcome.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create doors on any surface, including the air itself. The user can create doors that lead to an alternate dimension for hiding or travel.

knownTechniques.description: Creates a door in the air that leads to an alternate dimension
